messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Teeth Obsession
messages.msgSnippet: ... The Onion is very funny. Just thinking of that article had me chortling when one of those adverts came on for teeth whiteners. Me and the kids sat and made
messages.messageBody:
coyote's corner wrote:

> Thanks!! It's great to start the day w/ heavy laughter!!
> Janis
>

The Onion is very funny. Just thinking of that article had me chortling when one of those adverts came on for teeth whiteners. Me and the kids sat and made up lines for the advert.
'Do YOUR teeth not cause retinal blindness in your family. Then YOU aren't using ULTRA-ULTRA-ULTRA Whitener. Once you've been using our product You too will be able to signal to ships out at sea, with
JUST your teeth!!!'

That was Heather's effort.

Shyrley ;-)


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.messageBody:

Janis

From: Shyrley

The Onion did a funny article on Americans obsession with their teeth. Had me in stitches.

http://www.theonion.com/onion3915/us_dentists.html

messages.messageBody:

Everything in The Onion is a joke.

messages.msgSnippet: The Onion is famous for its spoofs. They even have a book out. HeidiWD ... You can no more win a war than you can win an earthquake.” —Jeannette Rankin
